metadata.titleEn: Geochemical data of Cretaceous monzonite and single mineral in Chuzhou area of the lower Yangtze River metallogenic belt
metadata.titleCn: 长江下游成矿带滁州地区白垩纪二长岩及单矿物地球化学数据
metadata.description: This data is the major and trace elements of Cretaceous monzonite, biotite, zircon U-Pb isotopic dating data and zircon Lu Hf isotopic data in Chuzhou area of the lower Yangtze River metallogenic belt. The major element data of the whole rock were obtained by XRF analysis, the trace element data were obtained by ICP-MS analysis, and the zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu Hf isotopic composition data were obtained by la-mc-icp-ms analysis. The major elements of biotite were obtained by EPMA analysis. The above data have been published in high-level SCI journals, and the data are true and reliable. Through the data obtained, we can better understand the petrogenesis and put forward more solid constraints on the geological evolution of the Qinghai Tibet Plateau.
metadata.descriptionCn: 本数据为长江下游成矿带滁州地区白垩纪二长岩全岩主微量，黑云母主量元素，锆石U-Pb同位素定年数据，锆石Lu-Hf同位素数据。全岩主量元素数据由XRF分析获得，微量元素数据由ICP-MS分析获得，锆石U-Pb定年及原位Lu-Hf同位素组成数据由LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得。黑云母主量元素由EPMA分析获得。以上数据已发表于高级别SCI期刊，数据真实可靠。通过获得的数据，可以更好地认识岩石成因，并对青藏高原的地质演化提出更坚实的制约。
metadata.instructions: The geochemical data are stored in word format, and the sample name is "YY DD", where YY is the sampling place name and DD is the sample serial number
metadata.instructionsCn: 地球化学数据以word格式存储，样品名称为"yy-dd",其中yy为采样地名，dd为样品序号

literatureList.titleEn: Geochemical study of Cretaceous magmatic rocks in Chuzhou region, low Yangtze River metallogenic belt: implications for petrogenesis and Cu–Au mineralization.
literatureList.referenceEn: Hu, Z. L., Yang, X. Y., & Lee, I. (2017). Geochemical study of Cretaceous magmatic rocks in Chuzhou region, low Yangtze River metallogenic belt: implications for petrogenesis and Cu–Au mineralization. International Geology Review, 60(11-14), 1479-1506. doi:10.1080/00206814.2017.1373606

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the characteristics of the geochemical data collected from biotite and zircon minerals used for understanding the formation of rocks in the Cretaceous period in the Lower Yangtze Metallogenic Belt?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 从下扬子成矿带收集的黑云母和锆石矿物的地球化学数据特征，用于理解白垩纪时期岩石的形成。
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: major element compositions, U-Pb isotopic dating, Lu-Hf isotopic compositions
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 主要元素组成、U-Pb 同位素定年、Lu-Hf 同位素组成

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many different types of isotopic and elemental data analyses are employed in a dataset related to Cretaceous syenite geochemistry in the Chuzhou area of the Lower Yangtze Metallogenic Belt?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 在与长江下游成矿带的滁州地区白垩纪辉长岩地球化学相关的数据集中，采用了多少种不同类型的同位素和元素数据分析？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis in the context of geochemical data collection?
Definition.QuestionCn: LA-MC-ICP-MS分析是在地球化学数据收集中的一种技术。
Definition.AnswerEn: LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis refers to Laser Ablation Multi-Collector Inductively Coupled Plasma Mass Spectrometry, a technique used to obtain zircon U-Pb dating and in situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition data. This method allows for precise measurement of isotopic ratios in minerals, aiding in understanding rock genesis and geological evolution.
Definition.AnswerCn: LA-MC-ICP-MS分析指的是激光剥蚀多收集器电感耦合等离子体质谱法，这是一种用于获取锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成数据的技术。该方法允许对矿物中的同位素比率进行精确测量，有助于理解岩石的成因和地质演化。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How do the data collection techniques, such as XRF for major elements and ICP-MS for trace elements, contribute to understanding the geological evolution of mineralization belts in the Lower Yangtze River region?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 数据收集技术，如XRF用于主要元素和ICP-MS用于微量元素，如何有助于理解下扬子江地区矿化带的地质演化？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The data collection techniques, like XRF for major elements and ICP-MS for trace elements, provide precise and reliable measurements crucial for interpreting the geological history and mineralization processes in the Lower Yangtze River region. These methods allow for the detailed analysis of whole rock and mineral compositions, helping researchers infer the rock genesis and impose constraints on the geological evolution of areas such as the Tibetan Plateau.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 数据收集技术，如XRF用于主要元素分析和ICP-MS用于微量元素分析，提供了精确可靠的测量，这对于解释长江下游地区的地质历史和矿化过程至关重要。这些方法允许对整个岩石和矿物成分进行详细分析，帮助研究人员推断岩石的成因，并对如青藏 Plateau等地区的地质演化施加约束。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences on the accuracy of geological evolution models when using zircon U-Pb dating and Lu-Hf isotopic data collected from LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 使用LA-MC-ICP-MS分析收集的锆石U-Pb定年和Lu-Hf同位素数据时，地质演化模型的准确性可能会受到哪些潜在影响？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: The use of zircon U-Pb dating and Lu-Hf isotopic data collected from LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis can provide more precise age determinations and insights into the source characteristics of the rocks, leading to more accurate geological evolution models by offering constraints on the timing and processes involved in the formation of the Cretaceous syenite in the Chuzhou region of the Lower Yangtze Metallogenic Belt.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 使用锆石U-Pb定年和从LA-MC-ICP-MS分析中获得的Lu-Hf同位素数据，可以提供更精确的年龄测定和岩石源特征的见解，从而通过提供关于长江下游成矿带的滇州地区白垩纪辉长岩形成过程和时序的约束，导致更准确的地质演化模型。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: What are the primary objectives of collecting geochemical data from biotite and zircon minerals when studying Cretaceous syenite in the Chuzhou region of the lower Yangtze metallogenic belt?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在研究长江下游成矿带的滁州地区白垩纪辉长岩时，收集黑云母和锆石矿物的地球化学数据的主要目标是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: The primary objectives of collecting geochemical data from biotite and zircon minerals when studying Cretaceous syenite in the Chuzhou region are to enhance the understanding of rock genesis and to provide a more robust constraint on the geological evolution of the Tibetan Plateau. The dataset includes major and trace element data from whole-rock analysis, obtained through XRF and ICP-MS analysis, as well as zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition data from LA-MC-ICP-MS analysis. Biotite major element data is obtained through EPMA analysis. These data are essential for constructing a detailed geochemical profile that can elucidate the formation processes and tectonic history of the region.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 收集来自生物云母和锆石矿物的地球化学数据的主要目标是在研究滁州地区的白云岩时，增强对岩石成因的理解，并为青藏高原的地质演化提供更可靠的约束。该数据集包括通过XRF和ICP-MS分析获得的全岩分析的主要和微量元素数据，以及通过LA-MC-ICP-MS分析获得的锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成数据。生物云母的主要元素数据通过EPMA分析获得。这些数据对于构建详细的地球化学剖面至关重要，可以阐明该地区的形成过程和构造历史。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumental or procedural steps are involved in collecting and analyzing geochemical data from biotite and zircon minerals for understanding rock genesis and geological evolution in the context of the Cretaceous diorite in the Chuzhou area?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 收集和分析来自黑云母和锆石矿物的地球化学数据，以理解位于滁州地区的白垩纪辉长岩的岩石成因和地质演化，涉及的仪器或程序步骤包括：
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The instrumental or procedural steps involve using XRF for obtaining whole-rock major element data, ICP-MS for analyzing trace elements, LA-MC-ICP-MS for acquiring zircon U-Pb dating and in-situ Lu-Hf isotopic composition, and EPMA for determining major elements in biotite. These methods allow for precise and reliable data collection that aids in the understanding of rock genesis and contributes to geological evolution studies.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 这些仪器或程序步骤包括使用XRF获取全岩主要元素数据，使用ICP-MS分析微量元素，使用LA-MC-ICP-MS获取锆石U-Pb定年和原位Lu-Hf同位素组成，以及使用EPMA确定黑云母中的主要元素。这些方法允许进行精确和可靠的数据收集，有助于理解岩石的成因，并为地质演化研究提供支持。
